title: my game keeps stoping any help(explained in the disscusion)
body:
so my game keeps randomly stoping and i got pissed i dont know why do i have a stable 40-50 ms and my pc specs are these:
AMD Athlon II X2 250 proccesor 3.0 ghz
8.0 gbs ram
graphic card:Sapphire AMD PCX NITRO Radeon RX 460 OC 4GB GDDR5
and a 90 gb hard disk that has 15 gb free space is it maybe the hard disk becuase its full or something i need help thanks for the replays :)

replies.body: Can you give me a few more details about the *stopping* so I have a bit more context around what's happening?
well it like freezes for like half a second and then my game moves slow even tho my fps is 150
and the animations roll out then the dissapear then they show again its like my net is dropping but idk any help?

Ah, yes. This sounds very much like common symptoms of *Packet Loss*. This often occurs if there are issues somewhere between you and the servers. I'd like you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League as your first step.

Let me know if this changed anything.
